channel.title: CVE Feed for softaculous -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for softaculous -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5599|2024-06-07T16:54:21.164Z -- softaculous -- fileorganizer%20%E2%80%93%20manage%20wordpress%20and%20website%20files
item.description: The FileOrganizer – Manage WordPress and Website Files plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.7 via the 'fileorganizer_ajax_handler' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including backups or other sensitive information if the files have been moved to the built-in Trash folder.

item.title: CVE-2024-5599|2024-06-07T12:33:43.953Z -- softaculous -- fileorganizer%20%E2%80%93%20manage%20wordpress%20and%20website%20files
item.description: The FileOrganizer – Manage WordPress and Website Files plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.7 via the 'fileorganizer_ajax_handler' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including backups or other sensitive information if the files have been moved to the built-in Trash folder.

item.title: CVE-2024-2504|2024-04-09T18:59:20.506Z -- softaculous -- page%20builder%3A%20pagelayer%20%E2%80%93%20drag%20and%20drop%20website%20builder
item.description: The Page Builder: Pagelayer – Drag and Drop website builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'attr' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 1.8.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
